page.title: 14RECREATION/4
page.content:
(continued) in the colts league. The practice night for the colts is Tuesday and for the adults is Thursday.
BOSBURY YOUTH CLUB
Bosbury has a long _ established youth club in a rural area where there are few alternative outlets for young people. Although the club has had more than its fair share of difficulties not the least of which have been connected with their need to maintain their own premises behind the village hall,their experiences should sound some familiar notes amongst other village clubs in the county. Mr. & Mrs. Clutterbuck, who now run the club, became involved several
